objects.text:
• Brilliant Retina Display
• Extended Battery Life
• Fast SSD Storage
• Backlit Keyboard

product_details.name: Apple MacBook Pro - Your Premium Workspace Companion
product_details.description:
• Sleek aluminum unibody design with premium build quality
• Brilliant Retina display for crystal-clear visuals
• Backlit keyboard for comfortable typing in any lighting condition
• Multi-touch trackpad with precise gesture control
• Multiple USB ports for versatile connectivity
• Extended battery life for all-day productivity
• macOS operating system for seamless workflow
• Perfect for professionals, creatives, and students
• Lightweight and portable design for on-the-go use
• Built-in HD webcam for video conferencing
• Fast SSD storage for quick boot and load times
• Superior sound quality with stereo speakers

banner_details:
The banner presents a sleek, professional layout with a modern tech product theme. It features a bold main title (`heading`) at the top in all caps, styled with a strong sans-serif typeface in white. Beneath it, a subtler subheading (`subheading`) in uppercase portrays the concept of a premium workspace using a muted blue tone. A bulleted list (`description`) outlines core features of the product, placed on the left panel for easy readability. A standout tagline (`tagline`) promotes an early bird discount in striking red. At the bottom left, the bold `price` stands out prominently, and is accompanied by a bright red call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`). A realistic image of a laptop setup (`product_image`) occupies the right side, enhancing visual appeal and product focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: `#1A2A4A`
- Steel Blue: `#4B72B0`
- Charcoal: `#0F172A`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Red: `#FF3B30`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek laptop alongside a phone, camera lens cap, and a red apple, set against a clean white background. The dominant colors include deep black (#1C1C1C) used for the screen, keyboard, and phone, with metallic silver (#D5D5D5) on the laptop and neutral gray tones (#A9A9A9) for keys. The bright red of the apple (#B22222) adds a vibrant pop of color that draws attention and contrasts beautifully against the monochrome elements. This elegant blend of monochrome and bold red offers a professional yet warm palette suitable for an advertisement banner, balancing sophistication and relatability.
